extensionShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the extension's name.

extensionDescription.message: Kudziwa zachinsinsi, Adblock yotetezedwa ya YouTube™. Imaletsa Zotsatsa pa YouTube.com.

timesaveInfo.message: Adblock ya Youtube™ yosungidwa pafupifupi. $savedTime$ ya moyo wanu wonse.
timesaveInfo.description: Tells the user how many time he saved already.

displayActionCountAsBadgeText.message: Onetsani kuchuluka kwa zopempha zoletsedwa mu baji
